sentence.text: Co-administration of probenecid with acyclovir has been shown to increase the mean half-life and the area under the concentration-time curve.
Urinary excretion and renal clearance were correspondingly reduced.
The clinical effects of this combination have not been studied.
sentence.negationtags: The clinical effects of this combination have <scope> <cue> not </cue> been studied. </scope>
